body: The battle scout's movement is not hampered by difficult terrain while within the advantageous terrain area. Furthermore, the battle scout can take 10 on Climb and Swim checks and checks to jump while within the area, even when in immediate danger or distracted. This ability replaces the ranger's second favored enemy.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Class Archetypes/Ranger/Ranger Archetypes/Battle Scout/Advantageous Terrain/3rd Round
name: 3rd Round
